评论详情: I usually buy an xs in everything because I'm 110 & 5'1.  All my scrubs I have to buy xxs or xs. but I definitely could have gotten a small or maybe even medium. I learned I like a looser fit with scrub jackets & this one fits very slim to my body. I look silly when I wear my company crewneck sweatshirt under it like I like to when it's cold . Also the seams are not flat anywhere they are rippled no matter how many times i use my steamer to lay them down.

I can't really describe my love/hate relationship with normal scrub tops. I can never seem to find the right size to fit my chest that is still comfortable on my arms and waist. I ordered a large in these scrub jackets, and I will never buy a different brand. They are SO soft, breathable, and easy to clean. I live in Florida, and it gets HOT and humid, and I am able to wear these year round. I highly recommend them to nurses, whether you're in the hospital or in an office, you will not regret this purchase!
